title: Emulating Camera
body: It would be extremely helpful if the emulator could use webcams as camera emulation.  Otherwise AR scenarios are hard to develop without a range of devices.  It has become even more needed with the addition of WXGA and the different scalings in WP8.

comments.body: I would be happy if I could load pictures as camera snapshots into the emulator
エミュレーターではカメラ機能をほぼ使えません。PCに接続されたWebカムがあるときにはEmulatorのカメラとして機能するよう改善してほしいところです。
